title: Mars in Virgo
summary: Drive focuses on precision, problem-solving, and useful service. Effort goes toward improving systems and details. The opportunity is to channel energy into meaningful fixes without overworking or nitpicking.

meaning.headline: Action is meticulous, organized, and oriented toward usefulness.

frames.text: Mars in Virgo supports thorough work, maintenance, and practical solutions.
Energy flows toward tasks that improve efficiency or wellbeing.
Lists and routines help convert motivation into progress.
The urge to perfect can be helpful if scoped.
Everything must be flawless before moving forward.

frictions: Paralysis from wanting the ideal plan
Taking on tasks to control outcomes
opportunities: Offering service where it is requested

do: Triage tasks by impact before diving in.
Set time boxes for detailed work.
Hydrate and stretch while you work.
Stop when good-enough meets the goal.
avoid: Fixing what is not yours to fix
Taking over others' tasks without consent
Skipping rest because there is always more to do

reusable_lines.text: Aim your effort where a precise fix makes a real difference.
Progress counts even when it is not perfect.

allowed_framing: Supportive framing: can sharpen focus and improvement
Agency-forward language: you choose what to refine
Contextual framing: precision helps when balanced with rest

sources: Mars as drive/assertion archetype in daily cycles
